## IAutoHideable interface

Interface for a component that can be automatically hidden.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IAutoHideable extends IComponent 
```
**Extends:** [IComponent](./blockly.icomponent.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [autoHide(onlyClosePopups)](./blockly.iautohideable.autohide.md) | Hides the component. Called in WorkspaceSvg.hideChaff. |
